entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
